Class Company

java.lang.Object
Company
public class Company extends Object
This class represents a car rental company.
Version:
(06/01/2023)
Author:
(Raz Yehiel)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Company()
    Creates a new empty Rent array with max of 1000 slots and sets the number of active rents in the array to 0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addRent(String name, Car car, Date pick, Date ret)
    Adds a given rent to the Company array and re-organizes the order of the rents per pick date. In case of similar pickdate in the array the new rent will be added after the existing one
    double
    averageRent()
    Calculates the average rent days in the array
    int
    getSumOfDays()
    Calculates the total number of renting days in the array
    int
    getSumOfPrices()
    Calculates the total earnings of all active rents in the array
    Car
    lastCarRent()
    Returns the car with the latest return date
    Rent
    longestRent()
    Returns the longers duration rents, in case of multiple rents with same number of days returns the first
    char
    mostCommonRate()
    Returns the most popular car type, in case of same number of type rents returns the better one.
    boolean
    removeRent(Date ret)
    Removes first rent with corresponding return-date from the company array and re-organizes the order of the rents per pick date
    String
    toString()
    Returns a string that represents the company array

  • Constructor Details

    • Company

      public Company()
      Creates a new empty Rent array with max of 1000 slots and sets the number of active rents in the array to 0

  • Method Details

    • addRent

      public boolean addRent(String name, Car car, Date pick, Date ret)
      Adds a given rent to the Company array and re-organizes the order of the rents per pick date. In case of similar pickdate in the array the new rent will be added after the existing one
      Parameters:
      name - the client's name
      car - the rented car
      pickDate - the pick date
      returnDate - the return date
      Returns:
      true if rent was added, false if the array is full

    • removeRent

      public boolean removeRent(Date ret)
      Removes first rent with corresponding return-date from the company array and re-organizes the order of the rents per pick date
      Parameters:
      returnDate - the rent's date which needs to be removed
      Returns:
      true if rent was removed, false if rent with the given return date wasn't found

    • getSumOfPrices

      public int getSumOfPrices()
      Calculates the total earnings of all active rents in the array
      Returns:
      the total earnings of active rents

    • getSumOfDays

      public int getSumOfDays()
      Calculates the total number of renting days in the array
      Returns:
      the total rent days in the array

    • averageRent

      public double averageRent()
      Calculates the average rent days in the array
      Returns:
      rent days average, 0 if there are no rents

    • lastCarRent

      public Car lastCarRent()
      Returns the car with the latest return date

    • longestRent

      public Rent longestRent()
      Returns the longers duration rents, in case of multiple rents with same number of days returns the first
      Returns:
      the longest rent, null if there are no rents

    • mostCommonRate

      public char mostCommonRate()
      Returns the most popular car type, in case of same number of type rents returns the better one. (B is better than A)
      Returns:
      most poupular car type, N if there are no rents

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string that represents the company array
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String that represents active rents in the company in the following format: The company has X rents: Name:Ruthi From:10/03/2022 To:14/03/2022 Type:A Days:4 Price:400 * *
